Package com.example.cmput301w24t33.events

Class Event

java.lang.Object
com.example.cmput301w24t33.events.Event
All Implemented Interfaces:
android.os.Parcelable, Serializable
public class Event extends Object implements Serializable, android.os.Parcelable
Represents an event, including details such as date, time, location, and participants. This class implements Serializable to allow event objects to be passed between activities or fragments.
See Also:
  • Serialized Form
